mapper.select: select task.id id, task.task_no taskNo, gaprep.gaprep_no gaprepNo, task.vehicle_no vehicleNo , task.line line, loader.loader_name loaderName , task.platform_no platformNo, task.task_type taskType, task.task_state state , (select depart.plan_depart_time from tfr.t_opt_truck_depart_plan_detail depart, tfr.t_opt_load_dest_org ldo where depart.id = ldo.truckdepartplandetail_id(+) and ldo.load_task_id = task.id and rownum = 1) planDepartTime , to_char(task.load_start_time, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') loadStartTime , to_char(task.load_end_time, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') loadEndTime from tfr.t_opt_load_task task left join tfr.t_opt_de_load_gaprep gaprep on task.id = gaprep.load_task_id and gaprep.be_valid = 'Y' left join tfr.t_opt_handoverbill handoverbill on handoverbill.load_task_no = task.id left join tfr.t_opt_loader_participation loader on task.id = loader.task_id and loader.be_creator = 'Y'

select count(task.id) from tfr.t_opt_load_task task left join tfr.t_opt_de_load_gaprep gaprep on task.id = gaprep.load_task_id and gaprep.be_valid = 'Y' left join tfr.t_opt_handoverbill handoverbill on handoverbill.load_task_no = task.id left join tfr.t_opt_loader_participation loader on task.id = loader.task_id and loader.be_creator = 'Y'
select id, loader_name, loader_code, load_org_code, load_org_name, join_time, leave_time, be_creator, task_type, task_id from tfr.t_opt_loader_participation where task_id = #{taskId}

select lw.id, lw.load_task_id, lw.stock_qty, lw.scan_qty, lw.load_qty, lw.waybill_no, lw.notes, lw.transport_type, lw.goods_name, lw.pack, lw.receive_org_name, lw.reach_org_name, lw.task_begin_time, lw.orig_org_code, o.name origOrgName, ((waybill.goods_weight_total / waybill.goods_qty_total) * lw.stock_qty) stockWeight, ((waybill.goods_volume_total / waybill.goods_qty_total) * lw.stock_qty) stockVolume from tfr.t_opt_load_waybill_detail lw left join tfr.t_opt_load_task lt on lw.load_task_id = lt.id left join pkp.t_srv_waybill waybill on waybill.waybill_no = lw.waybill_no and waybill.active = 'Y' left join bse.t_bas_org o on o.code = lw.orig_org_code and o.active = 'Y' where lt.task_no = #{taskNo}

select lw.id, lw.load_task_id, lw.stock_qty, lw.scan_qty, lw.load_qty, lw.waybill_no, lw.notes, lw.transport_type, lw.goods_name, lw.pack, lw.receive_org_name, lw.reach_org_name, lw.task_begin_time, lw.orig_org_code, o.name origOrgName, ((waybill.goods_weight_total / waybill.goods_qty_total) * lw.stock_qty) stockWeight, ((waybill.goods_volume_total / waybill.goods_qty_total) * lw.stock_qty) stockVolume, s.serial_no serialNo, s.load_time optTime from tfr.t_opt_load_waybill_detail lw left join tfr.t_opt_load_task lt on lw.load_task_id = lt.id left join pkp.t_srv_waybill waybill on waybill.waybill_no = lw.waybill_no and waybill.active = 'Y' left join tfr.t_opt_load_serialno s on s.load_waybill_detail_id = lw.id and s.goods_state <> 'CANCELED' left join bse.t_bas_org o on o.code = lw.orig_org_code and o.active = 'Y' where lt.task_no = #{taskNo} order by s.serial_no asc

select task.id id, task.task_no taskNo, gaprep.gaprep_no gaprepNo, task.vehicle_no vehicleNo, task.line line, loader.loader_name loaderName, task.platform_no platformNo, task.task_type taskType, task.task_state state, depart.plan_depart_time planDepartTime, to_char(task.load_start_time, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') loadStartTime , to_char(task.load_end_time, 'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss') loadEndTime from tfr.t_opt_load_task task left join tfr.t_opt_de_load_gaprep gaprep on task.id = gaprep.load_task_id and gaprep.be_valid = 'Y' left join tfr.t_opt_loader_participation loader on task.id = loader.task_id left join tfr.t_opt_load_dest_org loaddestorg on task.id = loaddestorg.load_task_id left join tfr.t_opt_truck_depart_plan_detail depart on depart.id = loaddestorg.truckdepartplandetail_id left join tfr.t_opt_handoverbill handoverbill on handoverbill.load_task_no = task.id where task.task_no = #{taskNo}

select id, load_waybill_detail_id, be_loaded, decode(scan_state,'N/A','未扫描',scan_state) as scan_state, goods_state, load_time, create_time, device_no, serial_no, task_begin_time, orig_org_code from tfr.t_opt_load_serialno where goods_state <> 'CANCELED' and load_waybill_detail_id = #{loadWaybillDetailId}
select id from tfr.t_opt_de_load_gaprep where gaprep_no = #{gaprepNo} and be_valid = 'Y'

select r.id as id, r.gaprep_no as reportNo, r.load_task_no as taskNo, r.deliverbill_no as deliverBillNo, r.gaprep_status as state, r.be_valid as beValid, r.plan_load_goods_qty_total as planLoadGoodsQty, r.actual_load_goods_qty_total as actualLoadGoodsQty, r.plan_load_goods_qty_total - nvl(r.actual_load_goods_qty_total,0) as lackGoodsQty, to_char(r.create_time,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as createTime, r.vehicle_no as vehicleNo from tfr.t_opt_de_load_gaprep r where r.id = #{id}

select d.waybill_no as wayBillNo, d.gap_type as gapType, d.transport_type as transportType, d.actual_load_qty as actualLoadQty, d.plan_load_qty as planLoadQty, abs(d.actual_load_qty - d.plan_load_qty) as lackGoodsQty, d.notes as notes, d.de_load_gaprep_id as reportId from tfr.t_opt_de_load_gaprep_detail d
d.de_load_gaprep_id = #{id}
